title: Ragdoll Mania
description: Step into the world of Ragdoll mania : Mini games, where fun games meet ragdoll games! This is the ultimate experience for anyone looking to combine funny games with stress relief games
instructions: Use left mouse button to target and punch.

title: Zig Snake
description: Zig Snake is a fast-paced arcade game where your snake zigzags forward nonstop! It's the ultimate test of your reaction speed, focus, and timing. Dive into this retro-style snake game, challenge yourself, and try to beat your high score!
instructions: The snake moves forward automatically. Tap or click to make the snake instantly change direction (left or right). Avoid crashing into the walls or falling off the track. Score points by staying alive as long as possible.

title: Lollipop Stack Run
description: Dive into a sweet adventure in Lollipop Stack Run which is a colorful parkour game! In this fun arcade game, keep running while collecting vibrant lollipops to stack your sweet tower. You need to be flexible and glide between various obstacles, making sure to collect as many lollipops as possible during the run.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Physics Balls
description: Physics Balls is a creative and challenging math and physics puzzle game. Here has numbers and ball elements. Improve your logical thinking and hands-on skills while having fun. Your aim is to break all bricks in one shoot. Throw balls to make them roll among the bricks. You can apply physical principles to control the balls cleverly.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Weapons and Ragdolls
description: Weapons and Ragdolls is an action-packed game featuring stickman characters and realistic physics. Use a wide range of weapons, from explosives to swords and firearms, while upgrading your arsenal to take on tougher challenges. Face diverse enemies, utilize slow-motion dodging, and enjoy randomly generated battles with increasing difficulty. Each fight offers a chance to refine your combat skills and try different strategies. Get ready for endless action and excitement!
instructions: Move mouse = move melee weapon Left Click = Shoot Hold right-click = slow motion

title: Pizza Tycoon
description: Play as Boss Hei Wa, running a pizza shop! Serve food, collect payments, hire and upgrade staff, and expand sales channels. Manage and grow your business to success!
instructions: Use Mouse to move
developer: Guangzhou Yomitoo Network Technology Co., Ltd.

title: Idle Landmark Builder
description: Enjoy a casual idle simulation management game in the Idle Landmark - Builder. Here, you'll play the role of a construction tycoon and build world-famous landmarks from scratch. Manage workers to increase speed or your income, hire more workers and build your own construction empire. Build world-famous landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower and the Pyramids, and witness the entire process of their construction.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Find Objects - Hidden Item
description: Find objects on colorful maps with links and Easter eggs! An interesting puzzle casual indie game in the genres of "Hidden Objects" and "Find the Differences"! Embark on an exciting journey through beautiful 2D locations, where hundreds of hidden objects and riddles await you! Explore picturesque landscapes, mysterious cities and magical worlds to find all the hidden objects. And in the "Spot the Difference" mode, test your attentiveness by comparing two almost identical pictures!
instructions: Control on the PC by clicking on the mouse.Click on the objects on the map, as in the lower part of the panel. Moving around the map: By holding down the right mouse button or the arrow key on the keyboard Zooming: Mouse wheel (scroll) Control on a mobile device by tapping your finger on the screen. Your task is to find all the items in the list. Use the hints to find those items that are hidden too well :)

title: Arcade Rope
description: Swing between platforms in Arcade Rope! Play free and online in this rope-swinging adventure. Arcade Rope is a fast-paced and addictive skill game where your goal is to swing from platform to platform using a rope. Perfectly time your swings to avoid falling into the abyss and see how far you can go. The gameplay is simple yet challenging, making it ideal for quick play sessions. Stay alert, react quickly, and master the art of swinging to survive longer.
instructions: Move: W,A,S,D Stretch the rope around the buildings to destroy.

title: Tap Block Puzzle: Smash Game
description: Tap Block Puzzle: Smash Game is a satisfying and addictive puzzle game where you tap on two or more matching blocks to smash them! ? Clear the board, create massive combos, and reach high scores in this colorful, fun-packed block smashing experience. Perfect for casual players and puzzle lovers alike!
instructions: Tap 2 matching blocks to smash them in this fun, colorful puzzle game!

title: Survival Racing: Extreme Road
description: Imagine that the time has come when ordinary racing is no longer enough adrenaline temptation. In a world where extreme sports are at the peak of popularity, a new competition has appeared - Survival Racing: Extreme Road. Overcome obstacles, avoid traps and fight your rivals to reach the finish line first. Your goal is not only to win the race, but also to survive in the face of fierce competition.
instructions: Control: WASD - Car control. C - camera change. Tab - opening the MENU. The space bar is a handbrake. Control for mobile devices: Use the on-screen game interface.

title: Smash the Car to Pieces!
description: Shoot the car with guns. Launch a combat drone or summon a tornado. Ram the car with a giant hammer or blow up all the windows with dynamite. There are many ways to destroy a car waiting for you in this game.
instructions: Left mouse button - Fire Right mouse button - Rotate Mouse wheel - Zoom Destroy the cars and get rewarded. Buy new improvements

title: Garden Guardians
description: A fun and strategic tower defense game that’s easy to pick up! Tap directional arrows to launch seeds into flowerpots—each seed blossoms into a powerful flower ready to blast incoming zombies. Plan your moves, hold the line, and protect your garden from the undead horde!
instructions: Tap arrow tiles to plant seeds and shoot zombies.
developer: Guangzhou Yomitoo Network Technology Co., Ltd.

title: Ocean Small Hospital Doctor
description: Dive into the exciting world of Ocean Small Hospital - Doctor! This casual and educational game is an absolute blast for animal lovers. In this game, you'll step into the role of a heroic doctor on a submarine-turned-hospital. Your mission? Rescue injured sea animals from the vast ocean depths. As you spot a distressed creature, quickly assemble your medical team and gear.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Find It Out Colorful Book
description: Begin a challenging yet relaxing casual game in Find It Out Colorful Book. It brings you into a colorful world. You will begin an adventure to find hidden objects. Choose your favorite mode like beach, city, zoo, etc. Each page is filled with color and mysterious numbers waiting to be discovered and unlocked.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Mr Disc: Slingshot Strike
description: Mr Disc is here to strike! Swipe, aim, and throw powerful discs to smash enemies, break obstacles, and clear every level in style. Easy to play, hard to master – can you become the ultimate Slingshot Striker?
instructions: Be Mr Disc! Swipe to throw discs and knock out everything in your path

title: Horror Playtime Room Escape
description: Challenge your brain to break through the fog of horror. In Horror Playtime - Room Escape you will enter a mysterious story. You spend your birthday with Ye Chen on the roof of a building. The strange woman suddenly appeared and trapped you in a horrible room. Enter many rooms full of puzzles and horror! Use your brain to solve hidden things and uncover the truth of horror stories. Every detail in the room is full of mystery.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Container Sort Puzzle
description: Container Sort Puzzle - Sort All the Cargo! Get ready to test your brain with Container Sort Puzzle, the ultimate cargo-sorting challenge! Load the right containers onto the right ships and become a port master! Perfect for fans of sort games, stacking puzzles, and logic-based challenges. Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned puzzler, Container Sort Puzzle will keep your brain sharp and entertained.
instructions: Your mission is simple: drag, stack, and sort containers based on color and type. But don’t be fooled—every level gets trickier! Plan your moves, unlock new harbors, and organize the chaos!

title: Single Stroke: Energy Line Puzzle
description: Single Stroke: Energy Line Puzzle is a fun and simple way to train your brain every day. This mind-challenging game has easy rules—just connect all the circles using a single continuous line. It’s a great way to keep your brain sharp with quick, clever puzzles. Spend just a few minutes daily to give your mind a boost. Enjoy this brain-training experience anytime, anywhere!
instructions: Simply draw a line to light up all the circles using one continuous stroke. If you get stuck, use a hint or restart the level to try again.

title: Geometry Dash Jump
description: Get ready for an electrifying challenge in Geometry Dash Jump Test your reflexes and timing as you jump, fly, and dash through neon-lit obstacles in a world of glowing geometry. With fast-paced action, rhythmic music, and intense gameplay, this game will push your skills to the limit!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Perfect Cake Maker
description: Get ready to make some seriously delicious cakes in Perfect Cake Maker! It’s a delightful casual simulation game. When you start, you’ll see a fully stocked kitchen and delicious guests waiting. First, choose the cake base based on your guests’ needs. Then comes the fun part – mixing the ingredients!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: LOL Funny Dance
description: LOL Funny Dance is a hilarious 2D game where you can distort the faces of politicians and celebrities to create the funniest expressions! Drag and move different points on the image to stretch, twist, and transform their looks into ridiculous and exaggerated versions. Watch them dance and react as you manipulate their faces in real time. Play the LOL Funny Dance game now.
instructions: Mouse to play.

title: Animal Sort - Cute Puzzle Game
description: Are you a pet person? Do you wanna run a farm that is full of cute animals? Try Animal Sort, not only be an owner but also be in charge of keeping them in line - the game you should not look away. This is not just a regular puzzle game, but it's also a fantastic one with a lot of mini games included. Moreover, we have an additional mode of building the pet city that you definitely won't be able to miss. Let's give it a try!
instructions: Use your mouse to move the pets.

title: Sudoku Master
description: Sudoku by in8finity is a classic puzzle game with a sleek dark theme, offering a smooth and enjoyable experience. Flexible settings let you adjust the difficulty to match your skill level. With intuitive controls and eye-friendly visuals, you can focus on solving puzzles without distractions. More than just a game, Sudoku trains logic, concentration, and memory. Challenge yourself and enjoy relaxing, distraction-free gameplay!
instructions: Sudoku is a logic-based puzzle where you must fill a 9×9 grid so that every row, every column, and each of the nine 3×3 squares contain the numbers 1 to 9 without repetition. Select an empty cell and enter a number that follows the rules. Use logic and elimination to find the correct solutions. If you make a mistake, you can change the number or use hints. Customize the difficulty to your liking, play at your own pace, and enjoy the challenge!

title: Italian Brainrot: Neuro Beasts
description: Welcome to the world of Italian Neuro-Animals! This is a clicker game featuring bizarre creatures generated by neural networks — get ready for chaos, memes, and pizza. Collect them all! Level up like crazy! And may the Neuro-Pizza be with you
instructions: Tap the screen with the character and get neuro-chips Upgrade in the upgrade menu to earn even faster and collect a full collection of animals Compete with other players and take the highest positions in the leaderboards

title: Potion Merge Witch
description: Combine magical potions to create bigger ones! Potion Merge Witch brings you a relaxing and magical merging experience. Can you create the ultimate potion? Try it now! - Combine identical potions to create new, bigger ones. - Use three special buttons: shake the cauldron, remove a potion or upgrade potions to speed up merging. Help the witch craft the biggest and most powerful potion ever!
instructions: On Desktop: Move your mouse to control the witch’s position, and click to throw potions into the cauldron On Mobile: Drag your finger to move the witch, and release to throw potions with a touch

title: Smoke Trail
description: Drift and earn in this fast-paced 2D endless drifting game! Master the art of controlled slides across an ever-changing track. Rack up cash by chaining stylish drifts and maintaining momentum—then use your earnings to unlock a growing collection of iconic drift cars, each with its own unique stats and feel. But it’s not just about the money—complete challenges to test your skill, and unlock a special car. Easy to pick up, hard to master—how far can you go before you crash?
instructions: WASD or arrow keys to move

title: TB Avataria Life Girl
description: Hey, how about helping me decorate my house? You need to decorate my home beautifully, buy me nice clothes, and feed me. Let's get started — right now, I have an empty house, and we need to furnish it together. Let's make it look organized and cozy! Before I get too hungry, you must take me to the café to eat, or I might lose my life from hunger! We also need to earn money. To make money, reach the computer and use the money-making app. You can either buy things or continue earning more money!
instructions: *Use the "WASD" keys to move. *Playable on both mobile and PC. *4 different hairstyles and 4 different outfits are waiting for you. *2 different ways to earn money.

title: Puzzle Lab
description: Tap connected blocks to clear them! If any blocks are left, you will lose life. The game ends when your life reaches 0. You can use placed special bombs by tapping them.
instructions: Tap two or more connected blocks to clear them.

title: Toy Claw Simulator
description: Toy Claw Simulator is a fun and addictive arcade game where you take control of a virtual claw machine to collect a wide variety of adorable toys! Carefully aim and time your claw to grab plushies, action figures, and surprise collectibles. Once you've stocked up your toy inventory, head over to the factory to sell them for shiny coins! Use your earnings to run the machine to use the crane to unlock new toys. It's a charming blend of skill, strategy, and rewarding progression!
instructions: Use WASD or Arrow keys to move the crane. Spacebar to grab a toy. Touch and move your finger to move the crane. Click to red button to grab a toy.

title: Bolts
description: Test your logic and strategy in this unique puzzle game. Solve intricate challenges by unscrewing bolts in the right order—every move counts. Features: Unique Levels – Each puzzle offers a fresh challenge. Strategic Gameplay – The sequence of moves is key. Engaging Puzzles – Designed to push your problem-solving skills. Every detail matters. Can you master the mechanics?
instructions: Your task is to move all the bolts so that all the slats fall down. Just click on a bolt and move it to a free nut in the correct order to free a slat. Determine the correct order of moving.

title: Troll The Teacher
description: Laugh and prank the teacher in this fun school game! Have you ever dreamed of playing a prank on your teacher? Now you have a chance! In this game, you will become a student who arranges funny pranks right during the lesson. Use the most unexpected "tools", upgrade them and watch the funny reactions of the teacher!
instructions: How to play: Choose a weapon — in your arsenal there are various items for practical jokes: paper airplanes, rotten eggs, darts and others. Each item has its own characteristics, so choose wisely! Watch the reactions — each of your practical jokes causes funny reactions from the teacher! The more you play him, the more vivid his emotions become — from irritation to real tantrums!

title: BlowUp ATM
description: BlowUp ATM – The ultimate heist action game where you become a master thief! Your mission? Plant explosives, blow up ATMs, and grab as much cash as you can before escaping! But beware – the cops are always on high alert!
instructions: Find an ATM – Move around the city and locate your target. Detonate & collect cash – Watch the money fly and grab as much as possible! Avoid the police – Escape before security or the cops catch you! Upgrade your heist gear – Unlock better explosives and faster getaways!

title: Ragdoll Beat - Simulator
description: In "Ragdoll Beat - Simulator" you will find crazy levels, chaos physics and familiar characters! How far can you go, creating incredible moments with a ragdoll? -Unique levels, where every object can become a tool of fun. -Realistic ragdoll physics - push, throw and watch the result! -The more you play, the more new situations you discover! Jump into "Ragdoll Beat - Simulator" and check what chaos physics is capable of! Complete all the tests, open new opportunities and enjoy crazy fun!
instructions: How to play "Ragdoll Beat - Simulator"? -Open the game to start your journey. -Use objects, to do this, pull them onto the ragdoll, creating unexpected situations. -Explore physics, combine objects and see how they interact with the ragdoll. -Open all the familiar characters and try out the ragdoll's capabilities on them!

title: Real Drive 3D
description: Are you ready to experience unique car-driving gameplay? Start with your SUV and unlock new vehicles as you progress through the game, playing different and unique levels. Drive your favorite vehicles, and navigate your way around new challenging environments. We welcome all racing car game fans to experience this new driving game! Real Drive 3D is a car simulation game which will give you a unique arcade experience.
instructions: Use W/A/S/D or on screen controls to move the car

title: 2048 Cube Merge
description: How far can your skills take you? Target, shoot and merge cubes while unlocking exciting upgrades and customizations. Enjoy captivating gameplay and stunning visuals with every move you make. The 2048 cube challenge begins now!
instructions: The player shoots numbered cubes on the board. Each cube displays a number, starting at 2. Merging cubes of the same value forms larger numbers, progressing to 4, 8, 16, 32, and beyond. The goal is to achieve the highest score.

title: Greek Tower Stacker
description: Build the tallest structure by stacking beautiful new floors. Each floor contains intricate pillars and arches reminiscent of the mighty Greek civilization. Challenge yourself to create the most majestic tower in ancient history.
instructions: Build the tallest Greek tower the world

title: World Z Defense - Zombie Defense
description: Zombies have taken over the world! Unlock bases and deploy soldiers with unique weapons, each with stats like damage, fire rate, and reload speed. Soldiers must reload at the base before defending. Place them wisely to stop zombies within range. Defeat waves to earn coins, upgrade bases, and survive stronger hordes. Strategically choose soldiers to clear waves and save cities across the globe.
instructions: Use the left mouse button to select and drop Soldiers and interact with in-game UI.

title: Fish Kingdom
description: Our game will show you in all the beauty of the real sea world. A world in which life is booming, because it is inhabited by sea creatures, mermaids, shells, plankton and many other amazing creatures of the sea world!
instructions: Mermaid Beauty's dressing room. Pick up her hairstyle, jewelry, and even the color for her tail. Fish Doctor. Yes, yes, fish also get sick, and they also have a doctor. Who will surely help, and cure. Find the objects. Test your attention, your keen eyes. Find hidden objects at the bottom of the sea! Create a beautiful sea world. Decorate the world of underwater inhabitants to your liking. Ecology. People often pollute our sea. Put the seabed in order. Save the fish, make the seabed cleaner!

title: Push To Go
description: Push to Go – A Fun & Addictive Puzzle Adventure! Get ready for an exciting brain-teasing experience with Push to Go, a 2D puzzle platformer built in Unity! Perfect for fans of logic games, button-based mechanics, and minimalist brain challenges, this game will test your timing, planning, and puzzle-solving skills.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Cloak Master Shooter Run
description: Cloak Master-Shooter Run allows you to show your shooting and running skills in an exciting environment! In this casual game, you will be transformed into a mysterious hero. Navigate through different scenarios, avoid obstacles and complete challenges.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Panda Kitchen Idle Tycoon
description: Want to become the best restaurant tycoon? You’ll build your own panda-themed food empire in Panda Kitchen: Idle Tycoon. Earn idle profits, and manage your way to success. Unlock new dining tables and kitchen equipment to improve efficiency. Recruiting chefs and servers to create an ultra-efficient restaurant team.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Happy Color
description: Happy Color – Smash Bricks & Relax! ? Are you ready for the most satisfying brick-smashing experience? Grab your colorful hammer and start breaking tiles in Happy Color! This fun and relaxing game will take you on a journey through vibrant levels filled with exciting challenges. Smash, break, and clear the board in a visually stunning environment designed to keep you entertained for hours!
instructions: The gameplay is simple yet addictive! Anyone can play, but mastering the game takes skill: Tap and Hold – Control your hammer to smash tiles. Break All the Blocks – Clear every tile to complete the level. Upgrade Your Hammer – Unlock powerful effects and new designs! Reach Higher Levels – Face more complex puzzles as you progress.

title: Noob Ragdoll: Crazy Punch
description: In "Noob Ragdoll: Crazy Punch", you'll see the world from a unique perspective - through the eyes of the glove itself! What Awaits You: -First-person camera - Feel like you're delivering the punch yourself! -Minecraft-style characters and vibrant action-packed scenes -Epic punches and spectacular body launches on every level -Multiple glove skins - choose yours and strike with style! Test your accuracy and style in "Noob Ragdoll: Crazy Punch" - ragdoll physics has never been this dynamic!
instructions: How to play "Ragdoll Playground: Cube Strike": - Open a level and aim from the glove's perspective - Click on targets - watch characters go flying - Earn coins for every accurate hit - Unlock new glove skins and try them out - Become the master of cubic strikes and show who's boss!

title: Sprunky Incredibox Mods
description: How many sprunki can you imagine in one game? What if they are all collected together?! In "Sprunki Incredibox Mods" you will have access to: -10 different mods for your sprunki -200 sprunki skins for your favorite characters -Unique sounds for special sprunki -Many places for your unique group Click play and find out what other characters are waiting for you in the game "Sprunki Incredibox Mods"!
instructions: - Click on the mod button - Choose the mod you like - Create your own unique compositions and groups - Copy the rating while you play and find out who will be next - Open all the mods and try each one!

title: Hoop Rivals
description: Hoop Rivals flips the court on its head! In this fast-paced arcade battler, you are the hoop—spinning, bouncing, and racing to catch the ball before your rivals do. Face off against up to 5 players in chaotic, high-flying matches where only the fastest hoop wins!
instructions: Use your Mouse or Keyboard to move left and right

title: Park Them All!
description: Park Them All! – The Ultimate Parking Puzzle Challenge! Are you ready to put your parking skills to the test? In Park Them All!, your goal is to park every car correctly without crashing! Solve tricky parking puzzles, avoid obstacles, and maneuver through tight spaces to complete each level. The challenge gets harder as more cars enter the scene! Can you park them all?
instructions: Press left or right to control car

title: Impostor Among Space
description: Impostor Among Space is a thrilling single-player stealth game where you play as the Impostor aboard a spaceship full of unsuspecting AI crewmates. Your mission? Eliminate them one by one, sabotage critical systems, and avoid detection at all costs.
instructions: mouse only

title: Robot Runner Fight
description: Are you ready for a robotic parkour adventure? Robots run and fight on high-speed parkour platforms! Youll control a flexible robot that travels through the city of the future. Avoid obstacles, fight enemies, and race to the finish line.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Uphill Rush 13
description: Introducing the new, thirteenth game in the Uphill Rush series, and this time in a new setting - a Water Park! Dive into (pun intended) the atmosphere of water fun, riding different types of tubes, surfboards and even jet skis! Unlock new power-ups and skins by overcoming obstacles, such as loops and long jumps. But don't be scared of them, they are your best friends when it comes to stunts, which give you bonuses! Not to mention, make you look insanely cool.
instructions: You can move the vehicle with the arrow keys. The ‘up’ key will move the vehicle forward. The ‘Left’ and ‘Right’ keys let you tilt the vehicle in the air, allowing you to perform stunts.
